::Prowl::

He saw Megatron lift off with Skullgrin.
"Yes Megatron. We shall meet again. And I'll take you out, for the honor
of all Maximals and Autobots."
Prowl fires two missiles up at Megatron and Skullgrin. He then jumps
back and waits to see if Firestrike will continue to fight or leave.
